ai.summary: A short, easy 0.6 km hike that offers a quick outdoor experience in the UK. Suitable for beginners or a casual stroll with minimal elevation and time commitment.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, with a well-defined path. Surface may include paved sections, compacted gravel, and occasional grassy patches; gentle slopes possible along the route.
ai.safety_notes: Great for daylight strolls; check weather and daylight hours. Wear sturdy footwear, bring a light layer and water, and keep to the marked path. Be mindful of uneven ground, and watch for other walkers, cyclists, or riders on shared sections. Have a means to navigate if you’re in an unfamiliar area.
recommended_gear: Map or smartphone with offline map
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March to October) for comfortable temperatures; can be done year-round with appropriate clothing and daylight.

seo.title: Illogan BR 28: Easy 0.6 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Illogan BR 28, a short 0.6 km easy hike in the UK. Quick, beginner-friendly walk with practical safety tips and gear.
